Beginner.title: Short Trip Replacement
Beginner.description: Replace 3 short car trips with cycling this week

Beginner.title: Wow
Beginner.description: The highest level of commitment to environmental impact

Intermediate.title: Commute Changer
Intermediate.description: Cycle to work/school at least 2 days this week

Advanced.title: Full Week Commuter
Advanced.description: Cycle to work/school every day this week

Expert.title: Car-Free Month
Expert.description: Replace all personal car trips with cycling for a month

Beginner.title: Public Transit Day
Beginner.description: Use public transportation instead of a car once this week

Intermediate.title: Carpool Week
Intermediate.description: Carpool to work/school at least 3 days this week

Advanced.title: Multi-Modal Commuter
Advanced.description: Use at least 3 different eco-friendly transport modes this week

Expert.title: Zero Emission Month
Expert.description: Only use zero-emission transportation for a month

Beginner.title: Lights Out
Beginner.description: Turn off lights when leaving rooms for a week

Intermediate.title: Unplug Challenge
Intermediate.description: Unplug electronics when not in use for a week

Advanced.title: Cold Wash Week
Advanced.description: Use only cold water for laundry for a week

Expert.title: Energy Audit
Expert.description: Conduct a home energy audit and implement 5 improvements

Beginner.title: Reusable Bottle
Beginner.description: Use only a reusable water bottle for a week

Intermediate.title: Zero Plastic Bags
Intermediate.description: Avoid all single-use plastic bags for a week

Advanced.title: Compost Champion
Advanced.description: Compost all food waste for two weeks

Expert.title: Zero Waste Month
Expert.description: Produce less than one small bag of landfill waste for a month

Beginner.title: Meatless Monday
Beginner.description: Eat vegetarian meals every Monday for a month

Intermediate.title: Local Food Week
Intermediate.description: Eat only locally produced food for a week

Advanced.title: Plant-Based Week
Advanced.description: Eat only plant-based meals for a week

Expert.title: Zero Food Waste
Expert.description: Generate zero food waste for a month

Intermediate.title: Group Ride Organizer
Intermediate.description: Organize a group cycling event this month

Advanced.title: Environmental Volunteer
Advanced.description: Volunteer for a local environmental cause this month

Expert.title: Sustainability Leader
Expert.description: Lead a community sustainability project this month
